articles.title: Fauja Singh: Driver held over hit-and-run death of world's 'oldest' marathon runner - BBC
articles.description: Police in India arrest a man they say was driving the car that hit Fauja Singh in his village on Monday.
articles.content:
Sarabjit Singh Dhaliwal
Nikita Yadav
Police in India have arrested a man in connection with the death of Fauja Singh, the world's oldest marathon runner, in a hit-and-run case.
